description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Bring your Avatar to the Golden Royal Casino for the holidays! The Casino has decked the halls with holiday decorations and five Winter Holiday themed slot machines, each with its own Minigame. Which will be your favorite? Bet on up to five paylines and earn 20 in-game awards. Dress up for the occasion and play on Xbox LIVE with up to seven other gamers
